entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS LATE THIS EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING WEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS AROUND 70

CLEAR, HOT
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
